skills.name: Spirit Ball
skills.description: Attacks the enemy with an Energy ball. The attack has a 50% chance of increasing the enemy's chance to land a Glancing Hit for 2 turns.

skill_effect.name: Glancing Hit
skill_effect.description: Accuracy is reduced by 50% and the chance for the monster to land a Glancing Hit of reduced damage will increase.

skills.name: Decelerate
skills.description: Attacks all enemies, decreasing their Attack Speed for 2 turns with an 80% chance on each target.
skills.level_progress_description:

Effect Rate +10%
Damage +10%

skill_effect.name: AOE
skill_effect.description: Applies skill to more than one target

skills.name: Shooting Star
skills.description: Summons shooting stars that attack all enemies randomly. The inflicted damage increases if the same target gets hit again.

skill_effect.name: AOE
skill_effect.description: Applies skill to more than one target
